document.title: Other Project Items Folder Context Menu

paragraph.paragraph: The Other Project Items folder has a context menu accessible by right clicking on the folder. The available items are as follows:

Add, Add Existing Item... Adds an existing project item under the Other Project Items folder. For more information on adding existing items, See ../../configuring/adding_items/adding_existings_items.xmlAdding Existing Items.

Add, Add New Folder... Adds a new virtual_folders.xmlVirtual Folder under the Other Project Items folder. For more information on adding new folder, See ../../configuring/adding_items/adding_folders.xmlAdding New Folders.

Delete
Delete is unavailable because top-level project folders cannot be deleted or removed.

Properties
Displays the ../../configuring/project_configuration/item_configuration/other_project_items.xmlOther Project Items Folder Properties.
